page.title: 11A FARMERS YEAR IN BRANDON
page.content: JANUARY_sheep brought under cover. Bulls turned out with cows. FEBRUARY_fertilisers crops. MARCH_starts lambing.Crops fertilised. APRIL_sows spring barley,plants pots,. other crops sprayed. MAY_cattle turned out into fields, swedes sown,sheep sheared. JUNE_silage made,wheat sprayed, haymaking. JULY_haymaking.Round bales best.Sheep dipped.Potatoes sprayed for blight. Wheat and barley starts to be cut. AUGUST_oil seed rape cut.Winter oats harvested. SEPTEMBER_sow winter wheat and barley. Calves weaned from cows.Potatoes picked. OCTOBER_cattle brought in.Sheep turned out together.Calves born later. NOV.& DEC._calves inside.Rams removed.
